name: Robocon 20XX
description:
This game was developed as part of Kyle Bosman game jam and stars Ziv Chromebeak  - Robot Party Jam 2022 - itch.io created using GB Studio. 

Play as  Ziv Chromebeak in a turn-based RPG battler inspired by games like Pokemon, recruit unloved robots to join your team and discover the truth of Giant Robots, robot massages and mysterious brother drama.

Now updated with some bug fixes and music from GB Studio sample project.

Game created by Leuvsion / Lewis Pugh.

Battle sprite art by Ademo / Ian Hannam
